item.description:
Most people are talking about Gary Oldman's performance in Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy (he is nominated for an Oscar), and I'm sure it's great. But the real draw for me is all the other actors. Almost all of the main principals are familiar faces (at least to me) from BBC and Masterpiece Mystery productions. For PBS devotees, this movie is star-studded! Benedict Cumberbatch. Mark Strong. Colin Firth (yes!).

You can find out more about Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy at the theater website: http://www.landmarktheaters.com. If you click on the link for "Boston" on the left, then scroll down on the right to find the movie, you will also find a link for the movie's official website. But check out YouTube; if you're lucky, you'll find videos of the movie's London premiere back in September. Search on "Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy London," then pick and choose!

I will purchase my ticket at about 3:20 p.m., then wait at the foot of the stairs in the theater lobby. Look for me and my red backpack. At about 3:40, I will move into the theater auditorium (can't miss the previews). You can find me there if you are late. The movie starts at 4:00 p.m.

After the movie, I will wait in the theater lobby to gather everyone. Look for the red backpack.

If we decide to go out after the movie, be prepared to add 25% to the cost of your order for both the tax and the tip. Bring cash to make paying the restaurant check easier.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event so I know who to look for.

Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the red backpack. See the event description for more details.
